name: Young Blue Dragon Zombie
movement: walk 30 ft., fly 70 ft., burrow 10 ft.
description: The Young Blue Dragon Zombie is a large undead creature that has decayed dragon features, with tattered wings and a ghastly appearance that exudes a dark aura.
memorable: Its ability to rise again after being dropped to 0 hit points makes it a relentless adversary.
goals: Typically serves dark masters and seeks to spread death and destruction.
relations: Related to blue dragons and other undead creatures, may serve powerful necromancers.
environment: Usually found in desolate, dark areas or controlled by powerful undead lords.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores make it a powerful melee attacker and durable opponent.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and Intelligence scores make it vulnerable to ranged attacks and limit its tactical decisions.
attacks: Multiattack with a bite and claw strikes that deal piercing and slashing damage, plus necrotic damage from the bite.
most_powerful_ability: Rotting Breath, which can cause substantial necrotic damage and create additional zombies from slain humanoids.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without seeing.
additional_information: Immunity to lightning and poison damage
Undead Fortitude allows it to avoid outright destruction
Can create more zombies from humanoids it kills
test_queries: large undead dragon with rotting breath
blue zombie dragon with high durability
formidable necrotic creature in dark areas
dragon zombie with powerful melee attacks
